pr_title: Be consistent about optimized Parquet writer being experimental

timeline.bodyText: If we do not care about backward compatiblity regarding session property maybe we can drop @LegacyConfig from config property too?
timeline.author: losipiuk

replies.bodyText:
i would care about backward compatibility, but there are no provisions in session properties for maintaining it.
in config properties there are, so i was able to do better there
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Well. You can have two session properties. And compute logical OR of those .... smelly I guess
replies.author: losipiuk

timeline.message:
Be consistent about optimized Parquet writer being experimental

The optimized Parquet writer is still experimental and was described as
in session property's description. This makes the naming and
descriptions consistent.
